review_data.title: Decent pub for an after-work beer

review_data.title: Good food, terrible service

review_data.title: Glass of Bollinger in the sun

review_data.title: A meeting with friends.

review_data.title: Very good hamburgers

review_data.title: quite possible the worst fish and ships I ever ate....

review_data.title: Great drinks, great service

review_data.title: Still going strong...thanks to Désirée
review_data.content: It's one of my favorite bars to go to in Zürich when I want a decent pint of Guinness served by a lovely person, Désirée. It's a pub in essence, only a bit more posh, but the prices are not any higher than other pubs...More

review_data.title: Gutes Burger, nette Bedienung
review_data.content: Habe dort den cheeseburger gegessen, bestellt "rare". War sehr gut, die Fries sind super, und die Kellnerin war sehr freundlich.

review_data.title: Great spot for a drink and snack
review_data.content: We ventured into this place while visiting Zurich. It was cold outside and needed to warm up a bit with some food and drink. This place is quite fun, nice atmosphere and decent prices. Service was good, so was the burger and beer!

review_data.title: Great Place for a Pint and a Burger

review_data.title: Finally I found a place where a single businessman can drink

review_data.title: Bar almost on the Bahnhofstrasse

review_data.title: Really enjoyed this one................

review_data.title: Still one of my favourite pubs...

review_data.title: Worth a visit

review_data.title: Good food! Can be noisy!
review_data.content: The Lion does a good burger and club sandwich, although some what pricey. It can also get very noisy some nights, so not a place for a quiet drink. Overall though, the staff are good and they pour a good pint.
